Name: Mandarine Sidecar
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of optionally, moisten rim with orange juice and rim with sugar. Lemon zest twist expressed and discarded..
Review: Sweet and sour brandy and mandarin orange.
Nutrition: One serving of Mandarine Sidecar contains 189 calories
